description:
You’re here because you want to be a published author. You have an idea and don’t know where to take it.

I’m here to teach you all you need to know in order to make that dream a reality! I love helping people and that’s why I developed this course. And for a limited time, I’m selling this course the lowest legally possible price at UDEMY!

Welcome to the “How I Created THIS Book in Less than 12 Hours!”

Join the millions of people who have self-published their own books. Why not you?

My name is Nick Nebelsky and I have published four books using this simple method. In this course, you’ll learn how to maximize your time, money, and enjoyment on your road to authorship. 

It’s time to STOP PROCRASTINATING and do something about it! Nothing happens if you only dream about it. You have to take ACTION! This course will help you achieve your dream of holding your book in print form and selling it on Amazon, Barnes & Noble, and more.

This course is designed for you. It’s a simple to use, step-by-step, and fool-proof. If you’re not completely satisfied, I’ll refund your money; no questions asked unless you have advice on how to make it better. Then, I’m all ears! However, if you’re happy and you know it, CLAP YOUR HANDS!

You’ll follow along step-by-step, as we’ll publish a book together! There’s a FAQ in the back (hey that rhymes) where I’ll answer the most often-asked questions. Or you can email me anytime! If problems arise (they almost always do), you’ll be ready to tackle them with CONFIDENCE!

Don’t get left behind! Believe me, I’ve been there. I’m here to help you finish what you started!

Join the millions of students who are self-publishing today. Don’t let your fear stop you. I’m here to help you!

This awesome course gives the average student not just a chance, but a solid course of action to publish their own book. But there's so much more than that. The instructor provides over 25 years experience as a backdrop to getting things done faster and more efficiently. By creating a book as he teaches, the author shows the student the trials and challenges that they could face AND HOW TO AVOID THEM.

You'll learn how to use fantastic software and how to print a book that will impress your family and one that you can sell to readers all across the world.

As a bonus, you'll also get your book into Kindle to reap the rewards of passive income. Amazon has created some wonderful tools to help you achieve success as a Kindle author and I'll show you step by step how to achieve success!

As much as I'd like to share some ideas about writing your book, I'll have to leave that for another course.

  • Assemble your assets (i.e., text, graphics, illustrations)
  • Next, you’ll Build your book.
  • Learn about copyright, ISBNs, barcodes, and more
  • Distribute Your Book!
  • Pre-Market Your Book
  • Save You Money!
  • Ultimately Help YOU PUBLISH YOUR OWN BOOK!
title: How I Created THIS Book in Less than 12 Hours!
